ANU.name: Noah White
interest: My research focuses on representation theory. Specifically I am interested in the representation theory of reflection groups, their Hecke algebras and the related algebraic geometry and combinatorics.
ANU.biography: I received my PhD in 2016 from the University of Edinburgh. Prior to arriving at ANU I was a postdoctoral researcher at the University of California, Los Angeles.
